installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl wget unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || exit
bash <(curl -s "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect%20(pt-BR)/Minecraft/Pocketmine-MP%20(0.15.10)/install.sh") | tee install.log
